title: a11yTools Extension for Safari macOS
creator: Paul J. Adam
description:
Adds a menu of accessibility testing tools to Safari:
Display Accessibility Tags & Attributes: ARIA, Images, Forms, Headings, Tables, etc. 
Others Tools: aXe console.log(), tota11y, HTML_CodeSniffer, Google A11y Dev Tools, etc.
ARIA & WCAG Info: Validate Page, ARIA 1.1 Spec, Checklist, etc.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
